snippet: One trial in 10 years seems a poor record for a court established with the lofty aspiration of bringing perpetrators of genocide and war crimes to justice. Tell us what you believe has been gained.
abstract: One trial in 10 years seems a poor record for a court established with the lofty aspiration of bringing perpetrators of genocide and war crimes to justice. Tell us what you believe has been gained.

headline.main: The Wheels of Justice Grind Slowly to a Verdict
